titles.title: IRA Charitable Rollover Incentive Act

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to waive the income inclusion on a distribution from an individual retirement account to the extent that the distribution is contributed for charitable purposes.
IRA Charitable Rollover Incentive Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: IRA Charitable Rollover Incentive Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from inclusion as income individual retirement account (IRA) distributions used for qualified charitable purposes. Sets forth related rules for charitable remainder trusts, pooled income funds, and charitable gift annuities.
